[[List of Japanese writers: T|T]] - [[List of Japanese writers: U|U]] - [[List of Japanese writers: W|W]] - [[List of Japanese writers: Y|Y]] - [[List of Japanese writers: Z|Z]]</center> *[[Abe Kobo]] (1924–1993) *[[Abe Kazushige]] (born 1968) *[[Abe no Nakamaro]] (698–770) *[[Abe Tomoji]] (1903–1973) *[[Aeba Koson]] (August 15, 1855 – June 20, 1922) *[[Agawa Hiroyuki]] (born 1920) *[[Sho Aikawa (screenwriter)|Aikawa Sho]] (born 1965) *[[Aizu Yaichi]] (August 1, 1881 – November 21, 1956) *[[Akae Baku]] (born 1933) *[[Jirō Akagawa|Akagawa Jiro]] (born 1948) *[[Satoru Akahori|Akahori Satoru]] (born 1965) *[[Akazome Emon]] (956–1041) *[[Aki Fuyuhiko]] (born 1958) *[[Ryūnosuke Akutagawa|Akutagawa Ryūnosuke]] (March 1, 1892 – July 24, 1927) *[[Anrakuan Sakuden]] (1544–1642) *[[Anzai Atsuko]] (born 1929) *[[Anzai Fuyue]] (March 9, 1898 – August 24, 1965) *[[Aoyama Tomoki]] *[[Arai Hakuseki]] (1657–1725) *[[Toichiro Araki|Araki Toichiro]] (1895–1977) *[[Arashiyama Kozaburo]] *[[Arishima Ikuma]] (November 26, 1882 – September 15, 1960) *[[Arishima Takeo]] (March 4, 1878 – June 9, 1923) *[[Ariyoshi Sawako]] (January 20, 1931 – August 30, 1984) *[[Asada Jiro]] *[[Asagiri Yoshimi]] *[[Ashida Enosuke]] (January 8, 1873 – December 9, 1951) *[[Asai Gaiyu]] (1241–1301) *[[Asai Ryoi]] (died 1691) *[[Atsumi Jouji]] *[[Awashima Kangetsu]] (October 23, 1859 – February 23, 1926) [[Category:Lists of Japanese writers|A]]
